      • canAttack

        public boolean canAttack(Position np,
                         Board board)
        Tests if pawn can attack the position desired or if the new position results in an en passant.
        Parameters:
        np - New position to test
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        true if pawn can attack or en passant

      • move

        public boolean move(Position np,
                    Board board)
        Moves the pawn piece to new space. Also includes auto promotion to Queen if no promotion piece specified and pawn lands on its last rank.
        Specified by:
        move in class Pieces
        Parameters:
        np - New Position to move to
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        true if move successful

      • promotionMove

        public boolean promotionMove(java.lang.String promotion,
                             Position np,
                             Board board)
        If the player specified a piece to promote to, this method will replace current pawn with the piece that they specified.
        Parameters:
        promotion - Letter of piece player wants to promote to
        np - New position to move to
        board - Current board
        Returns:
        true if move and promotion successful
